definition[0]: a surface that consists of soil with grass on top, or an artificial surface that looks like this
definition[1]: a square piece of turf cut out of the ground
definition[2]: an area that you think of as being your own
example[1]: How vigorously will the local companies defend their turf?
example[2]: We beat Canada on their home turf.
definition[3]: to cover an area of land with turf
